Package uno.anahata.asi

Class AsiConfig

java.lang.Object
uno.anahata.asi.model.core.BasicPropertyChangeSource
uno.anahata.asi.AsiConfig
All Implemented Interfaces:
PropertyChangeSource
public class AsiConfig extends BasicPropertyChangeSource
A hybrid static/instance class for managing global and application-specific configurations.
  • Static methods provide access to the root Anahata AI working directory and its global subdirectories.
  • An instance of this class represents the configuration for a specific host application (e.g., "netbeans", "standalone"), managing its unique preferences and its own application-specific subdirectories.
Author:
anahata-gemini-pro-2.5

  • Constructor Details

    • AsiConfig

      public AsiConfig(String hostApplicationId)
      Creates a configuration instance for a specific host application. Upon instantiation, it loads the preferences for that application.
      Parameters:
      hostApplicationId - A unique identifier for the host application (e.g., "netbeans").

  • Method Details

    • savePreferences

      public void savePreferences()
      Saves the current preferences for this host application to disk.

    • getAppDir

      public Path getAppDir()
      Gets the root working directory for this specific host application instance. e.g., ~/.anahata/ai/netbeans
      Returns:
      The application-specific working directory.

    • getAppDirSubDir

      public Path getAppDirSubDir(String name)
      Gets a named subdirectory within this host application's working directory, creating it if it doesn't exist. e.g., ~/.anahata/ai/netbeans/sessions
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the subdirectory.
      Returns:
      The Path to the application-specific subdirectory.

    • register

      public void register(Chat chat)
      Registers a new chat session with this configuration.
      Parameters:
      chat - The chat session to register.

    • unregister

      public void unregister(Chat chat)
      Unregisters a chat session from this configuration.
      Parameters:
      chat - The chat session to unregister.

    • getActiveChats

      public List<Chat> getActiveChats()
      Gets an unmodifiable list of all active chat sessions.
      Returns:
      The list of active chats.

    • getWorkDir

      public static Path getWorkDir()
      Gets the root Anahata AI working directory (e.g., ~/.anahata/ai).
      Returns:
      The root working directory path.

    • getWorkDirSubDir

      public static Path getWorkDirSubDir(String name)
      Gets a named subdirectory within the global root working directory, creating it if it doesn't exist. This is used for shared resources like provider configurations. e.g., ~/.anahata/ai/gemini
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the subdirectory.
      Returns:
      The Path object for the subdirectory.
